name: AVAssetReferenceRestrictions
desc: Restrictions to use when resolving references to external media data.

items.name: static var forbidAll: AVAssetReferenceRestrictions
items.desc: The asset can only reference media stored within its container file.

items.name: static var forbidRemoteReferenceToLocal: AVAssetReferenceRestrictions
items.desc: A remote asset shouldn’t follow references to local media.

items.name: static var forbidLocalReferenceToRemote: AVAssetReferenceRestrictions
items.desc: A local asset shouldn’t follow references to remote media.

items.name: static var forbidCrossSiteReference: AVAssetReferenceRestrictions
items.desc: A remote asset shouldn’t follow references to remote media data stored at a different host.

items.name: static var forbidLocalReferenceToLocal: AVAssetReferenceRestrictions
items.desc: A local asset shouldn’t follow references to local media data stored outside its container file.

items.name: static var defaultPolicy: AVAssetReferenceRestrictions
items.desc: The asset should use the default reference restrictions policy.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates reference restrictions with an integer value.
